title: Blitzcrank's Poro Roundup
body:
http://a3.mzstatic.com/us/r30/Purple7/v4/ef/b8/bd/efb8bd47-c2b9-fe76-8e84-dc90aee30378/screen640x640.jpeg

Hey everyone,

Make sure you get this game onto your phones before the cabinet closes on September 21st!

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/site/skins-arcade/bpr.html

Have you played it yet? whats your favourite level so far??

Who's the hardest bossss?

replies.body: Lissandra has gotta be the hardest..
Yeah, fuck lissandra.
The first part is easy against{{champion:127}} but after she makes the ice floor it is annoying af

^ this

but for the no boss damage achievement, twitch is hard

Can you expand it to more tablets please. Like the HP Note Extreme (Nvidia Tegra Note 7) and the HP Pro Slate 8. 

If it doesn't work I won't complain, but at least would like a chance to try it.
This is fun but kinda hard, for me at least.

Please release this game on Windows phones!
I saw a meme that said that 'Every time a cool app comes out, its always, "Available for Android and IOS only"'
They weren't joking...

Am I missing something here? The game on your site's not loading for me. The bar fills, then nothing.
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/site/skins-arcade/bpr.html
yeah the sames happening for me too
Weird works for me, what browser are you using? and what ISP are you with?
You need Unity web player.

I played it but it froze up as soon as I got to Jinx. AS for putting it on phones, will it only be available until the 21st of September? Because, at the moment, I definitely don't have a phone that *could* even be capable of running it, let alone be able to put it on, and I'm not expecting to have one by the end of September, so does that just mean I miss out entirely?

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=rFEdetdf,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-08-21T05:52:10.379+0000)
>
> I played it but it froze up as soon as I got to Jinx. AS for putting it on phones, will it only be available until the 21st of September? Because, at the moment, I definitely don't have a phone that *could* even be capable of running it, let alone be able to put it on, and I'm not expecting to have one by the end of September, so does that just mean I miss out entirely?

you can download an android phone emulator and install it on that.
Not on a bubbletouch you can't...

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=rFEdetdf,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2015-08-21T05:56:59.267+0000)

I meant on a PC
See, the reason I didn't even think of that is because, as far as I'm aware, they all cost money to use and, honestly, f*ck that sh!t.

> See, the reason I didn't even think of that is because, as far as I'm aware, they all cost money to use and, honestly, f*ck that sh!t.

bluestacks doesn't.
Last time I used it, it had a 1 day free trial then said "you have to pay to continue using this" so I quickly uninstalled.
whats up with corki is that supposed to just be a laugh with that urf manatee

I did like the Journal of Justice reference with {{champion:45}} entering with balloons

I cant believe I remember that issue all the way back in 2011...
You gonna release it for microsoft phones or nah?

I played it a little, lost soon after defeating Singed.

I think I'll play some more.
